plot: An eccentric collection of mid-20th-century dictating equipment reflects one man's zeal for the history and design of 'Dead Media:' wax cylinder, wire, and magnetic recording machines.
title: The Great Dictator: Sam Kalow's Collection
plot_es: An eccentric collection of mid-20th-century dictating equipment reflects one man's zeal for the history and design of 'Dead Media:' wax cylinder, wire, and magnetic recording machines.
original_name: The Great Dictator: Sam Kalow's Collection
